content: knitted vest with round neck in drops air pattern no ai-246 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio 150-200-200-200-250-250 g colour 10 fog **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for rib
